title: Activity
description: A decision activity is used to control the decisioning process. It specifies the filter applied to the total inventory of options to narrow them down by topic/category. The activity also specifies a fall back option should the combined constraints disqualify all narrowed-down options. A decision activity ican be thought of as a type of http://schema.org/Action

schema:name.title: Name
schema:name.description: Activity name. The name is displayed in various user interfaces. Property has the semantic of schema.org's 'name' property defined on http://schema.org/Thing

schema:startTime.title: Start Date and Time
schema:startTime.description: Activity Start Date and Time. Property has the semantic of schema.org's 'startTime' property defined on http://schema.org/Action

schema:endTime.title: End Date and Time
schema:endTime.description: Activity End Date and Time. Property has the semantic of schema.org's 'endTime' property defined on http://schema.org/Action

https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.title: Decision Activity
https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decision.description: The reference to an activity that is configuring how the decision is made. The value is the URI (@id) of the decision activity that is referenced. See schema https://ns.adobe.com/experience/decisioning/activity
